RESET_PASSWORD.TITLE: Reset kata sandi
RESET_PASSWORD.DESCRIPTION: Enter the email address you use to log in to Chatwoot to get the password reset instructions.
RESET_PASSWORD.GO_BACK_TO_LOGIN: If you want to go back to the login page,

API.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Link pengaturan ulang kata sandi telah dikirim ke email Anda.
API.ERROR_MESSAGE: Tidak dapat terhubung ke Server Woot, Silahkan coba lagi nanti
